name: New Mexico Black Lawyers Association (NMBLA)
description: Founded in 1982, the NMBLA is an organization dedicated to supporting African American attorneys in New Mexico and addressing their specific needs. They aim to improve judicial selection, study legislative needs, and protect civil rights

name: Best and Associates
description: Hannah Best, one of the founding members of the NMBLA, heads this law firm

name: Davis Law New Mexico
address: 1000 Lomas Blvd NW, Albuquerque, NM, USA
description: This firm focuses on civil rights, personal injury, and wrongful death cases. It was founded by Philip Davis and later joined by his son, Nicholas

name: Law Offices of Darlene Gomez, LLC
description: This firm specializes in Tribal Law, Corporate Law, and Family Law. They are also involved in causes related to Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women (MMIW)

name: New Mexico Legal Group
address: Offices in Albuquerque and Las Cruces, New Mexico. Specific street addresses not provided
description: This firm serves clients statewide in divorce, family law, criminal defense, and estate planning

name: Jones Law Firm, LLC
description: This firm handles criminal, civil, and personal injury cases in Albuquerque
